# BLJM60454.savepatch

### 1.  Same patches may not be supported by BSD yet
### 2. Money 2byte Exchange

Target File: `SYS-DATA`

```
5200001C 00000004
520000D0 00000000
510000D0 00000002
5100001E 00000000
510000D2 00000002
5100001C 00000000
200000D0 00000000
5200001C 00000004
52000044 00000000
```

### 3. Omamori Exchange of gold+silver and bronze/red

Target File: `SYS-DATA`

```
52001BD0 00000004
520000D4 00000000
510000D4 00000002
51001BD2 00000000
510000D6 00000002
51001BD0 00000000
200000D4 00000000
```
